about_the_game:
Welcome to test your reflexes and patience. Enjoy transforming from a regular green guy to a little dasher!

* Control our little, green, and cute character to finish every level.
* There are 10 levels that are different and playable during the game.
* Lots of funny and educational signs will be waiting for you in the game!

Are some levels hard for you? Don't worry I added a Pass Level button on the pause menu, but please don't use it unless it's necessary.

Here are a couple of things to do in-game:

-> Just run and jump at the right time

-> Don't die (optional)

-> Read all signs to learn game mechanics (please)

-> No need to collect coins, but collect anyway because I made an effort to add them.


Unnecessary fact: This project is the first game I have ever created.

I hope you will enjoy it while playing.
There is a small message in the last level for you all.

Finally, I'm wondering about your opinions after finishing the game.
Please, feel free to share your thoughts about the game.

Creator: Dogukan Onder
detailed_description:
Welcome to test your reflexes and patience. Enjoy transforming from a regular green guy to a little dasher!

* Control our little, green, and cute character to finish every level.
* There are 10 levels that are different and playable during the game.
* Lots of funny and educational signs will be waiting for you in the game!

Are some levels hard for you? Don't worry I added a Pass Level button on the pause menu, but please don't use it unless it's necessary.

Here are a couple of things to do in-game:

-> Just run and jump at the right time

-> Don't die (optional)

-> Read all signs to learn game mechanics (please)

-> No need to collect coins, but collect anyway because I made an effort to add them.


Unnecessary fact: This project is the first game I have ever created.

I hope you will enjoy it while playing.
There is a small message in the last level for you all.

Finally, I'm wondering about your opinions after finishing the game.
Please, feel free to share your thoughts about the game.

name: Little Dasher!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or up-to-date versions
  • Processor: Any CPUs (produced after 2010)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPUs (have 512 MB VRAM atleast)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: I tested the game on my potato PC. It runs well.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 4th gen or better CPUs
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPUs (have 2 GB or more VRAM)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Little Dasher! is a mini-game that offers an average of 30-45 minutes of enjoyable and challenging platform game experience with fantastic music. Please note that the time depends on your reflexes and abilities.
